mapper.select: select * from tbl_testpage where test_id=#{test_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and test_pass=#{test_pass, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_testpage (test_id,test_title,test_cont,test_date)values(#{test_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{test_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{test_cont, jdbcType=VARCHAR},SYSDATE)
